title: Fix Memory MCP Server Issues
description: Fix the issues in the memory MCP server index.ts file and set it up for local running with npx command to work with the user's Windsurf configuration.

title: Implement missing methods in KnowledgeGraphManager
description: Implement the missing deleteEntities and deleteObservations methods in the KnowledgeGraphManager class.

title: Fix type property handling in loadGraph method
description: Fix the loadGraph method to properly handle the type property when parsing entities and relations from the file.

title: Improve error handling in JSON parsing
description: Enhance the loadGraph method to handle invalid JSON gracefully, skipping invalid lines instead of failing the entire operation.

title: Fix server initialization syntax
description: Fix the unusual comma placement in the Server constructor call that might cause syntax errors.

title: Set up for local run with npx command
description: Configure the project to run locally using npx command to work with the user's Windsurf configuration.
